title: Legendary Destruction
data:
{{version023}}
{{flavour|Conjures two explosive magical effects in instant succession. The effects can be any mix of Fireball, Iceblast, and Ghostly Fireball.}}

'''Legendary Destruction''' is a monster-only spell which randomly conjures forth two of three powerful magical effects:
*[[Fireball]], 42% chance,
*[[Wand of iceblast|Iceblast]], 33% chance,
*[[Ghostly Fireball]], 25% chance.

{{monsters with spell}}

==History==
*Prior to [[0.19]], the list of spells consisted of six spells: [[Orb of Electrocution]], [[Lehudib's Crystal Spear]], [[Orb of Destruction]], [[Ghostly Fireball]], [[Fireball]], and [[Flash Freeze]]. Also, the caster randomly conjured only one of those magical effects.
*Prior to [[0.17]], each casting injured the caster for 10 HP.
*This spell was added in [[0.14]]
